sec.title: Availability of data and materials
sec.p: The mortality and hospitalization records used during the current study are not publicly available to protect the confidentiality of the subjects. These records may be requested for research purposes from the Michigan Department of Health and Human Services. The weather data used in epidemiologic analyses in the current study are available from the National Climatic Data Center [ 102]. The ED visit data were derived from Healthcare Cost and Utilization Project data [ 21]. The climate data, historical and projected, are available from the Great Lakes Integrated Sciences + Assessments Center on request ( glisa.msu.edu).
